nodes.text: The Erighal family was a Chiss family belonging to the Chiss Ascendancy's Great Families. It possessed a fleet named the Expeditionary Force Alpha. The Erighal family was allied with the Ruling Dasklo family.

The Erighal family was one of three Great Families involved in Haplif of the Agbui and Jixtus's conspiracy to draw the Chiss Ascendancy into civil war. The other two families were the Pommrio family, allied with the Ruling Plikh family; and the Xodlak family, allied with the Ruling Irizi family.
